user_query: I'm planning a family gathering and we need some good music to set the mood. Can you suggest the top duo/group artists of the year for a lively playlist? Additionally, we would like to download a song for each artist on the list. Thank you!

TaskList.description: Fetch the top duo/group artists of the year based on music charts or streaming platforms.
For each artist retrieved in step 1, find a popular song by them.
Download the song selected for each artist in step 2.
